basics.name: Robert E. Fauver

basics.summary: I graduated in 2000 with a degree in Graphic Design. While in school I fell in love with creating and computers which led me to design and create websites. It's important for me to be original, challenge myself and look forward in everything that I do. I want to work with a team that shares the same passion for web development that I do and if they don't they will after they meet me.
